column4: My swap partition is broken. It's listing it as filesystem "unknown". Is it safe to reformat it to linux-swap while I'm still in Gnome?
In Gparted, it says the filesystem is unknown
I also get boottime errors about my swap
can you do a cat /proc/meminfo and put it on pastebin
Putting it in my pastebin, but I just looked and it says I have 0 swap and 0 swap free
ok thats what i wanted to know, dont bother with the pastebin
both?  What does meminfo say now?
awesome, you have swap for now...now make sure it happens next time you restart
look for the line like: /dev/sda2       none            swap    sw              0       0
Yeah, it's there. That's why I was getting boottime errors about swap issues
